thread.title: great location - no coffee in the room - Review
thread.title_full: great location - no coffee in the room - Review of W New York - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Baker911
title: great location - no coffee in the room - Review
text: This hotel is in the heart of Time Square. It is a very hip hotel but that didn't bother us. The room was spacious and nice. Two negatives: no free wifi and no inroom coffee. Neither of these things would stop me from visiting again because the location and quality of the room can't be beat.
